page.title: 20Tourists
page.content: {TOURISTS }We get many tourists in Lyndhurst especially in the summer. {The shops keep going during the winter {with the money they get from the {summer.}There are seasonal influxes of tourists, at Christmas, Easter, and the summer.{People come to Lyndhurst {from all over the world, they come {individually and they come in tour {parties.}They come from all over the country to camp in the forest.{On Bank {Holidays the roads become blocked with {cars and caravans, at weekends in the {seasons the traffic becomes very {heavy.}To the traders the tourists are their comfort for the long winter months.{Local people benefit from the {tourist trade but some complain that {shop prices are high.}It is exciting to see and meet people from different countries.{Alex Hobson, age 8. {
